summary: A guide where i teach you how to install many of the complicated ENB's on the Skyrim Nexus, in fast, simple tutorials. I also show you the results of them.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Hi. I'm Kev, I've made this page to teach you guys how to download a lot of the ENBS on the Skyrim Nexus because I myself at first had a lot of trouble learning how to do it. This page is also to show the differences between all the popular ENBS, it'll also show you the expected FPS drops, i'll be adding more ENBS especially more FPS friendly ones 
[/size]
[size=3]You'll need SKSE, goto the bottom of the page if you don't know how to download SKSE. (Tutorial)
You'll also need ENBDev, Links will be next to the videos.[/size]
[size=3]Let's begin:[/size]

[center][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?]Realvision ENB[/url] By SkyrimTuner
Uses this [url=https://workupload.com/file/RLz1oaM6]ENBDev[/url]
Estimated performance hit 15-25 FPS (GTX 960)

[youtube]9b67Fqou7Bw[/youtube]

Realvision Results:

[youtube]TDruwL544zA[/youtube]


[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20781/?]Project ENB[/url] By Bronze316
Uses this [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0221.htm]ENBDev[/url]
Estimated performance hit 8-14 FPS (GTX 960)

[youtube]HjmUEvt9tF4[/youtube]

Project ENB Results:

[youtube]dr1v3vZYmG4[/youtube]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41482/?]Rudy ENB[/url] by Rudy102
Uses this [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0308.htm]ENBDev[/url]
Estimated performance hit 8-15 FPS (GTX 960)

[youtube]OiNSCNjGTqo[/youtube]

SKSE

[youtube]oPgolvcGCWQ[/youtube][/size][/center]
author: Kevalt
